# RRB Nursing Portal Project

> This project is a recruitment portal for the Railway Recruitment Board (RRB) Nursing Superintendent exam.

## Project Structure
- Framework: React + Vite + TypeScript
- Styling: Tailwind CSS + shadcn/ui
- Routing: React Router DOM

## Key Documentation
- /notifications: List of active recruitment notices
- /apply: Multi-step application form
- /syllabus: Detailed exam syllabus
- /blogs: Preparation strategy and guides

## API
(Mock data is currently used in src/data/mockData.ts)
